post:
Haven't posted any offers for a long time since it is hard to promote that already is cheap.  
While the price is cheap, the service you get for the money is priceless.

So I decided to add a a couple of packages with more resources and see if it pleases the LET crowd.      


**Shared Hosting Offer **       

`         Disk:  5 GB  
 Bandwidth: 100 GB / month 
 unlimited options
`

**Locations: **               
[cPanel Amsterdam, NL - 5G Special](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)     $7.00 / year      
       
[cPanel Phoenix , USA - 5GB Special](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=22)      $7.00 / year                  
     
Only 10 in each location available.   

      
The reseller offer in Phoenix comes with a dedicated IP, something I haven't offered before.             

**Reseller Hosting Offer **      

`Disk: 20 GB
 Bandwidth: 750 GB / month
 Dedicated IP      
 Overselling possible
 No account limit   
`
    
[Reseller 1 - Phoenix, USA - Dedicated IP](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4)      

(only 2 available) - using promo code `F7J4O7CWL6` gives you 15% discount on the listed price (shown below)
* monthly:  $7.95
* quarterly: $21.95
* semi-annually: $41.95
* annually: $79.95



Not to your liking? Tell me what you want and how much you want to pay for it and I'll see what I can do.
